description:
Real-time NYC subway intel at your fingertips: stations, arrivals, service alerts, and route planning. 

Why Use It

You’re in your AI-powered IDE, mid-flow, when that little voice in your head goes: “Wait… is my train even running?” Instead of doom-scrolling Twitter or refreshing three different apps, just ask this MCP. Live trains and service alerts, right when you need them.
